body_html: @anikalindtner I don't like the idea of having three fields for the financial information. I'd see us posting it as a hint basically a way for them to calculate that stuff on their own using the calculator ;) maybe if we need cross-checking, we can have them post the url in the text field.
body_text: @anikalindtner I don't like the idea of having three fields for the financial information. I'd see us posting it as a hint basically a way for them to calculate that stuff on their own using the calculator ;) maybe if we need cross-checking, we can have them post the url in the text field.
body: @anikalindtner I don't like the idea of having three fields for the financial information. I'd see us posting it as a hint basically a way for them to calculate that stuff on their own using the calculator ;) maybe if we need cross-checking, we can have them post the url in the text field.
